name: Food From The Sky
detailed_description:
Food From The Sky - is a casual game where you have to catch foods that fall from the sky. There is a good meal that raises your score counter, and there is a bad one that lowers. When you reach a certain number of food points, your difficulty level increases and the amount of falling food increases. The goal is to eat as much food as possible, and not to reach a negative number of food points, because then you will lose.

Features:

-Interest gameplay

-System of levels

-Perfect graphics and effects

-Pleasant music

short_description: Food from the sky is a casual platformer in which you play as a parrot. Your task is to eat as much as possible food that falls from the sky, but do not eat bad food, like muhammers or grebe. How much food can you eat?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 200 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
